Package org.universAAL.ui.gui.swing.bluesteelLAF.support Description

The support package contains classes to help to build the bluesteelLAF. These classes include custom JButtons, tray icon manager, background definer, and special borders. More complex support components are located in their own packages, these are the collapsable system menu bar, and the main menu pager.
